name: Bloody Stars
description:
How to play

Tab for cursor.

Drag Healing item into hotbar slot.

Key 1,2 and 3 to use hotbar items.

W,A,S,D to move.

Skills

Q,E,R,F,G.

Damage self and Allies

T.

Left of screen 3 buttons for camera 

4 buttons at top 

Invnetory,PaperSkeleton3DDemo,CosmeticShop(not working),OptionsMenu

Inventory

Double click to euip item or drag to slot.

Class button opens class change menu

Cosmetics(not working)

Skills button will show information about the skills for the current players class.

Options menu

Save,Load,MainMenu

Goal

Have fun!
